tutorialEntries: Sadly you are not the only one capable of using Java! An evil force is controlling Skeletons to hinder you from reaching the Exit! To your left you can see how they are instructed.

Note that their "attack()" method is exclusive to them, but to make up for it, they can't use items! Now protect the key and yourself from this fiend. Can you figure out what to do for yourself? You don't need to read the next message if you can...

You can also press F5 or click on the Knight-Icon in order to deactivate the compiler. You can then adjust the code even if there are currently errors!
You may also rename variables by pressing Ctrl-R in Codefield with their declaration!
Collect the key, then turn and collect the sword, turn back and kill the Skeleton with "useItem()". Knights strike before Skeletons do!
